channel.title: When ever I click "(playername)Wishes to trade with you" it doesn't work?
channel.description:
I send a trade request normally but it doesn't seem to open the interface? I read around somewhere that changing the packethandler ID thingy from 139 to 39 or the other way round would work, but now when I right click trading follows.
So simplify things. Do you have a fix for : A) Clicking "(playername) wishes to trade with you". or B) Changing Following to trade with. (Clicking follow trades and trade with follows)
Sorry if it doesn't make sense :P

item.title: When ever I click "(playername)Wishes to trade with you" it doesn't work?
item.dc:creator: @Devastational Devastational
item.description:
@Devastational wrote:

I send a trade request normally but it doesn’t seem to open the interface? I read around somewhere that changing the packethandler ID thingy from 139 to 39 or the other way round would work, but now when I right click trading follows.

So simplify things. Do you have a fix for :
A) Clicking “(playername) wishes to trade with you”.
or
B) Changing Following to trade with. (Clicking follow trades and trade with follows)

Sorry if it doesn’t make sense

Read full topic
item.source: When ever I click "(playername)Wishes to trade with you" it doesn't work?
